PREFIX.description: Prefix of your bot Ex: - , / , # , & etc. Put anythong except @

SESSION_ID.description: A random string for your bot session. Which works as an OTP to get qr code. And you have to chane sessioon every time to get a new qr.

MODS.description: The phone numbers of the users who you want to be admin for the bot (should be in international format without + and multiple numbers must be separated by a comma "," Ex: 9477123456,9470123456 )

TENOR_API_KEY.description: A key used for gif searches. If you don't have any read PublicKeys.md to get a public Tenor API key. Or copy paste it: AIzaSyCyouca1_KKy4W_MG1xsPzuku5oa8W358c

MONGODB.description: Your MOngoDB URL. If you don't have any read PublicKeys.md to get a public MongoDB URL
